name: Morph 64
overview: Morph is the C64 conversion of the 1993 Amiga game, Pollymorph, a single-player colour-matching puzzle game. In this game the player controls a small ball that can be used move other balls around. When two same-coloured balls meet they disappear and the game objective is to clear the game area by pushing balls of the same colour together. The number of balls and the complexity of the game area increases as the player progresses through the game.
